net.hockeyapp.android.metrics

Class Sender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hockeyapp.android.metrics.Sender

  • public class Sender
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    Either calls execute or executeOnExecutor on an AsyncTask depending on the API level.

      • mWeakPersistence

        protected java.lang.ref.WeakReference<net.hockeyapp.android.metrics.Persistence> mWeakPersistence

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sender

        protected Sender()
        Creates and initializes a new instance.

        Persistence has to be configured separately and has to be set directly after initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • triggerSending

        protected void triggerSending()
        Triggers sending of available telemetry data in an AsyncTask. Checks with persistence for available data, if the max amount of concurrent requests is not reached yet. Does nothing, if the maximum number of concurrent requests is already reached or exceeded.

      • triggerSendingForTesting

                                        java.lang.String persistedData)

      • loadData

        protected java.lang.String loadData(java.io.File file)
        Read the contents of a file from the persistence layer.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to read.
        Returns:
        Persisted data as String, or null if the persistence is not set or the file does not exist.

      • createConnection

        protected java.net.HttpURLConnection createConnection()
        Create a connection to the default or user defined server endpoint. In case creating a custom URL for the connection fails, a connection to the default endpoint will be created.
        Returns:
        connection to the API endpoint

      • onResponse

        protected void onResponse(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,
                          int responseCode,
                          java.lang.String payload,
                          java.io.File fileToSend)
        Callback for the http response from the sender.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection containing the response.
        responseCode - The response code from the connection.
        payload - the payload which generated this response
        fileToSend - reference to the file we want to send

      • isRecoverableError

        protected boolean isRecoverableError(int responseCode)
        Determines if an HTTP response code denotes an error from which we can recover by sending the data again.
        Parameters:
        responseCode - The response code to check.
        Returns:
        True, if we can recover from this error code, otherwise false.

      • isExpected

        protected boolean isExpected(int responseCode)
        Determines if an HTTP response code denotes a status which we regard as successful completion.
        Parameters:
        responseCode - The response code to check.
        Returns:
        True, if the response code means a successful operation, otherwise false.

      • onUnexpected

        protected void onUnexpected(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,
                            int responseCode,
                            java.lang.StringBuilder builder)
        Handler to be called if an unexpected response was returned from the ingestion endpoint.
        Parameters:
        connection - The connection containing the response.
        responseCode - The response code from the connection.
        builder - A string builder for storing the response.

      • readResponse

        Reads the response from a connection.
        Parameters:

        builder - a string builder for storing the response

      • getWriter

        protected java.io.Writer getWriter(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a writer from the connection stream (allows for test hooks into the write stream)
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection to which the stream will be flushed
        Returns:
        a writer for the given connection stream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown by GZIP (used in SDK 19+)
